result.execSummary:
Michael Lee LeConte was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Michael Lee LeConte was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Sean Drury for Joshua H. Klaff in court.  Scott H. Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Extradited. Case Dismissed.

Defendant Michael Lee LeConte in court in custody with attorney Joshua H. Klaff.  Richard Jay Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deft Signs WAIVER OF EXTRADITION in Open Court;  Further proceedings scheduled for March 4, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Michael Lee LeConte in court in custody with attorney Shaun O'Connell.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Extradition hearing scheduled for February 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
